Name: Mossen Seikkailut
About the game: A storm known as Koiranilma is rising. Prepare yourself for the ancient storm ritual of doggos and become the Dog of Honor! Mossen Seikkailut is an indie RPG adventure where you solve puzzles as a dog and face real-time fights on your way to glory. Gain respect by helping others and learn new fighting techniques to defeat those who oppose you. Experience all of this in magnificent 640x480 resolution! Key Features: Real-time battles Boss challenges Puzzles Paint quality cinematics Dogs and cats Made with RPG Maker XP.
